basic.Peptide Name: SpCrus4 (S. paramamosain crustin 4; type 1, modular design; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 6S=S; UCSS1a)
basic.Target Organism: Active against S. aureus, B. subtilis, and B. megaterium (MIC below 0.8-1.6 uM), Gram- V. parahaemolyticus (MIC <12.5 uM), V. alginolyticus (MIC <12.5 uM), V. harveyi (MIC <25 uM), E-coli, A-hydrophila (MIC >25 uM), fungi P-pastoris (MIC >25 uM), and C. albicans (MIC <12.5 uM). Updated 7/2021
